page.title: 20NEIGHBOURHOOD WATCH
page.content: The Neighbourhood Watch was started in Billington because the nearest police are at Leighton Buzzard and people felt that more protection was needed. The aims of the Neighbourhood Watch are to deter criminals, to establish community spirit, to protect by mutual cooperation, to inform the coordinator or police of anything suspicious. This is not a vigilante scheme. In Billington at the moment there is a coordinator and 6 other members who each watch an area. There is regular communication within the group and also with the police. Last summer when the rapist called 'The Fox' was seen in the area people became scared. The Neighbourhood Watch was called many times when suspicious characters had been seen and the police were called.
